00003 template<long l>
00004 inline _zcovector zcovector_small<l>::to_zcovector() const
00005 {VERBOSE_REPORT;
00006   zcovector vec(l);
00007   for(long k=0; k<l; k++){
00008     vec(k) =(*this)(k);
00009   }
00010   return _(vec);
00011 }

00055 /*!  */
00056 template<long l>
00057 inline void zcovector_small<l>::write(const char* filename) const
00058 {VERBOSE_REPORT;
00059   std::ofstream ofs(filename, std::ios::trunc);
00060   ofs.setf(std::cout.flags());
00061   ofs.precision(std::cout.precision());
00062   ofs.width(std::cout.width());
00063   ofs.fill(std::cout.fill());
00064   
00065   ofs << "#zcovector" << " " << l << std::endl;
00066   for(long k=0; k<l; k++){
00067     ofs << (*this)(k) << std::endl;
00068   }
00069   ofs.close();
00070 }

00072 //=============================================================================
00073 /*!  */
00074 template<long l>
00075 inline void zcovector_small<l>::read(const char* filename)
00076 {VERBOSE_REPORT;
00077   std::ifstream s( filename );
00078   if(!s){
00079     ERROR_REPORT;
00080     std::cerr << "The file \"" << filename << "\" can not be opened." << std::endl;
00081     exit(1);
00082   }
00083   
00084   std::string id;
00085   s >> id;
00086   if( id != "zcovector" && id != "#zcovector" ){
00087     ERROR_REPORT;
00088     std::cerr << "The type name of the file \"" << filename << "\" is not zcovector." << std::endl
00089               << "Its type name was " << id << " ." << std::endl;
00090     exit(1);
00091   }
00092   
00093   long _l;
00094   s >> _l;
00095   if(l!=_l){
00096     ERROR_REPORT;
00097     std::cerr << "Matrix size is invalid." << std::endl;
00098     exit(1);
00099   }
00100   for(long k=0; k<l; k++){
00101     s >> (*this)(k);
00102   }
00103   if(s.eof()){
00104     ERROR_REPORT;
00105     std::cerr << "There is something is wrong with the file \"" << filename << "\"." << std::endl
00106               << "Most likely, there is not enough data components, or a linefeed code or space code is missing at the end of the last line." << std::endl;
00107     exit(1);
00108   }
00109   
00110   s >> id;//tmp
00111   if(!s.eof()){
00112     ERROR_REPORT;
00113     std::cerr << "There is something is wrong with the file \"" << filename << "\"." << std::endl
00114               << "Most likely, there are extra data components." << std::endl;
00115     exit(1);
00116   }
00117   
00118   s.close();    
00119 }

00143 inline comple nrm2(const zcovector_small<l>& A)
00144 {VERBOSE_REPORT;
00145   comple v(0);
00146   for(long i=0; i<l; i++){
00147     v+=A(i)*A(i);
00148   }
00149   return sqrt(v);
00150 }

00153 /*!  */
00154 template<long l>
00155 inline void idamax(long& K, const zcovector_small<l>& A)
00156 {VERBOSE_REPORT;
00157   comple max(-1.);
00158   for(int k=0; k<l; k++){
00159     if( max<fabs(A(k)) ){
00160       K=k;
00161       max =fabs(A(k));
00162     }
00163   }
00164   return;
00165 }
